name: Blind Spot (itch) (MarcosAtienza, DavidODonnellM)
description:
Blind Spot (itch) (MarcosAtienza, DavidODonnellM) is an action-shooter game developed by MarcosAtienza and DavidODonnellM. It came out on 15-02-2023.
Blind Spot (itch) (MarcosAtienza, DavidODonnellM) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
